text: Vy nikogda ne sumeyete otnosit'sya odinakovo spravedlivo k zhenam, yesli by dazhe ochen' khoteli etogo. Ne bud'te zhe polnost'yu blagosklonnym [k odnoy], ostavlyaya [druguyu] zabroshennoy. Yesli zhe vy ispravite [svoi pregresheniya otnositel'no zhen] i budete bogoboyaznenny, to ved' Allakh - proshchayushchiy, miloserdnyy
